house_listing.house_description: This single family home has 4 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, skylights.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Game Room, Garage Door Opener, Great Room, Guest Room,Kitchen Island, Library, Skylights, Wet Bar
